data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martins, Ubirajara R., Galileo, Maria Helena M., Santos-Silva, Antonio (2015): A new genus and two new species of Rhopalophorini Blanchard, 1845 (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Cerambycinae). Zootaxa 4000 (3): 377-382, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4000.3.4
